package.name: aims_wc1_support

description.p: OSU AIMS support for lab work cell #1 (wc1)
This package contains physical configuration data and launch files for Work Cell #1 at the AIMS Lab @ Ohio State.
All urdfs are based on emperically measured locations provided by acbuynak.

Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model(s) and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: acbuynak
package.maintainer: acbuynak (AIMS Lab @ The Ohio State University)
